definition: to fail in observing or supervising/to miss/to let sth slip through
to lose/to miss/to fail
short name for Chahar Province 察哈爾|察哈尔[Cha2 ha1 er3]
variant of 察[cha2]
to examine/to inquire/to observe/to inspect/to look into/obvious/clearly evident

sentences.english: They said all countries need to strengthen oversight and crisis management mechanisms.
sentences.chinese: 他们说所有的国家都需要加强失察和危机管理机制。

sentences.english: This – and a lack of independent oversight by NGOs and journalists – have mixed into a toxic cocktail.
sentences.chinese: 非政府组织和新闻工作者的失察也是其中一方面原因。

sentences.english: But I also agree that the cops weren't on the beat.
sentences.chinese: 但我同意监管部门也存在失察。

wrongdoing/failure to do one's duty

error/fault/(law) negligence/delinquency
